name: Unfinished Business
description:
Most people don't see ghosts. But you're not most people. Your clients need knowledge from beyond the grave, and they're willing to pay you to transmit that information from the ghosts of their loved ones into the world of the living. As the ghost-whisperer, you play in VR, and the only thing you see is the ghosts. Meanwhile, the ghost whisperer's client (who isn't in VR) sees a scene with a mystery to solve, but they can't see the ghosts who have answers to the mystery.

In this episode, you have to find your former CEO's will, so you can figure out who inherits her massive bitcoin wallet.
